package.name: r_iodefine
package.details: Hardware access to I/O peripherals on RZA2M device IMPORTANT - Please read if using projects generated by e2studio 7.1-7.4 Remove the following files from project prior to installing this module: generate\system\inc\iobitmask.h generate\system\inc\iodefine.h Remove the following folders from project prior to installing this module: generate\system\inc\iobitmasks generate\system\inc\iodefines Remove the following folders from Settings -> C/C++ Build -> Cross ARM C++ Compiler --> Includes dialog "${ProjDirPath}/generate/system/inc/iobitmasks" "${ProjDirPath}/generate/system/inc/iodefines"
